name: FLAPPY DASH (Juanda999)
description:
This is a game inspired in Geometry Dash and Flappy Bird, your goal is to survive as long as you can jumping between more of 10 types of obstacles such as:

  • Normal Obstacle
  • Toggle Obstacle (It appears and dissapears with every input)
  • Flip Gravity Obstacle
  • Speed Changer Obstacle
  • Mirror Portal Obstacle (Is that a GD reference?)
  • Spam Obstacle (It will duplicate itself many times)
  • Key Obstacle
  • Button Obstacle
  • Background Changer Obstacle
  • Random Point Obstacle
  • Spam Obstacle V2 (You have to jump many times to deactivate the obstacle)
  • Revert Obstacle (It reverts the gravity of the player and brings back him to the center)
  • Obstacles with walls that don´t kill but moves you outside the screen
  • Power Up Obstacle (It gives you a random power)

POWER UPS

Tha game contains a total of 2 power ups:

  1. Bomb Obstacle: When you touc it it gives you 1 of ammo, and when you press K or touch the button (in Android) it will shoot a projectile that destroys the first obstacle it touch
  2. Heart Obstacle: It will give a extra life to the player, when it dies by touching an obstacle, it will destroy it.

SKINS

By the moment, the game contains a total of 12 diferent skins (all unlocked by default).

ROADMAP

This is the first and last version of the game in PC, because i have plans to keep updating the game in Android by adding:

  • Leader Boards
  • Achievements
  • Challenges
  • Unlockables Skins
